content.question: Which of the following situations will benefit lenders of fixed interest rate loans?

choices.label: The actual inflation rate is equal to the natural rate of unemployment.
The actual inflation rate is less than the expected inflation rate.
The actual inflation rate is equal to the fixed interest rate.
The consumer price index is greater than 100.

content.answer: The actual inflation rate is less than the expected inflation rate.
